channel.title: Prayer glitch
channel.description:
when I am using prayer like melee, magic, ranged, smite etc...only the melee one has the graphic symbol appear above my forehead but I can select all the prayer spells at once. Is their a way to fix this glitch?
I attached an image so you can see.

item.title: Prayer glitch
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That’s not a glitch. Disabling usage of multiple headicon prayers simultaneously is handled in the server, not the client.
So you have to figure that out yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer glitch
item.dc:creator: @Cameronscape Cameronscape
item.description:
@Cameronscape wrote:

its with almost all servers im not sure how to fix it tho

Read full topic
